name: TRESR
description: Unlock rewards & immersive experiences with blockchain authenticated gear. Connect with like-minded communities.

missions.name: AVAX Cards
missions.description: AVAX Cards offers a unique collection of digital and physical trading cards, backed by blockchain technology. Each card features an NFT digital twin, allowing users to authenticate and trade securely

quests.name: Claim Digital Twin
quests.description: Claim the NFT version of your physical AVAX Card

tasks.name: Claim Digital Twin
tasks.description: Claim the NFT version of your physical AVAX Card

badge.name: AVAX Card Collector
badge.description: Awarded for claiming an AVAX Cards Digital Twin NFT

missions.name: Claim TRESR Merchandise Digital Twin
missions.description: Claim your TRESR Merchandise Digital Twin NFT to verify authenticity.

quests.name: Claim Merchandise Twin
quests.description: Claim the NFT twin of your TRESR merchandise.

tasks.name: Claim NFT
tasks.description: Claim the digital twin of your TRESR merchandise.

badge.name: TRESR Verified
badge.description: Awarded for claiming a TRESR Merchandise Digital Twin NFT.
